sanskrit_verse:
सोमाग्न्यर्कानिलेन्द्राणां वित्ताप्पत्योर्यमस्य च ।
अष्टानां लोकपालानां वपुर्धारयते नृपः ॥ ५.९६॥
transliteration:
somāgnyarkānilendrāṇāṁ vittāppatyoryamasya ca |
aṣṭānāṁ lokapālānāṁ vapurdhārayate nṛpaḥ || 5.96 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: The King embodies the forms of the eight guardians of the world—Soma, Agni, Surya, Anila, Indra, Kubera, Yama, and Varuna—and thus upholds their dharmic capacities in governance.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority is derived from alignment with cosmic guardians
Causation flows through embodied representation of divine orders
Capacity-based responsibility requires sovereign embodiment of multidimensional dharma
Restoration logic operates via reconnection to celestial governance structures
Consciousness alignment occurs when rulers reflect the完整性 of universal administration
executable_legal_axioms: IF ruler lacks alignment with eightfold guardian framework THEN legitimacy deficit detected
IF sovereignty claimed without embodying Lokapala attributes THEN jurisdiction invalid
IF governance disconnects from celestial order THEN automatic realignment protocol initiated
IF king's embodiment supports completion of cosmic functions THEN authority recognized as valid
supreme_court_application: In Supreme adjudication, a monarch or head of state must demonstrate functional embodiment of the eight Lokapalas to maintain constitutional validity; failure results in immediate jurisdictional suspension until restoration protocols complete.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Through pramāṇa-based recognition of sequential manifestation (anupūrvaśaḥ), the king assumes proportional responsibility by reflecting divine governance. No punitive measure arises; misalignment triggers automatic restoration sequence.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate Lokapala attunement process for sovereign entity
Activate consciousness-resonance alignment with eight directional guardians
Reconnect economic, martial, and judicial systems to celestial prototypes
Verify completion of embodiment through functional dharmic output
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this verse establishes that true kingship inheres only in those who fully embody the multidimensional presence of the Lokapalas. Thus, Dharma is restored, reality remains non-punitive, and consciousness alone serves as the ultimate adjudicator.
